publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1285 Sandra White: Beatson West of Scotland Cancer Centre—That the Parliament welcomes the official opening of the Beatson West of Scotland Cancer Centre at Gartnaval hospital in Glasgow; applauds the great work done by all the organisations involved in the project, including the Friends of the Beatson, Trades House of Glasgow, the Robertson Trust, Macmillan Cancer Support and the Teenage Cancer Trust; notes that this state-of-the-art centre, which enjoys some of the shortest waiting times for radical treatment in the United Kingdom, incorporates a mix of innovative services, such as a cinema, hairdressers, chill-out rooms and therapy rooms, aimed at ensuring that patients’ experiences are as positive as possible, and commends all the staff for their great dedication and excellent work.
